name: places/ChIJKzLoWxFawokRwgSOuH1Gu2Q
adrFormatAddress: Broadway, New York, NY 10004, USA

originalText.text: These guys are horrible. Stay away. Customer support barely speaks English.  They charge your account without your authorization for compliance when they do not provide the adequate info to become compliant. Worst merchant i have had to work with by far

text.text: These guys are horrible. Stay away. Customer support barely speaks English.  They charge your account without your authorization for compliance when they do not provide the adequate info to become compliant. Worst merchant i have had to work with by far

originalText.text: The absolute WORST company. Terrible customer service and they will hold your money for weeks without telling you why. Also, The customer service reps barely speak proper English. Just cancelled my account!

text.text: The absolute WORST company. Terrible customer service and they will hold your money for weeks without telling you why. Also, The customer service reps barely speak proper English. Just cancelled my account!

originalText.text:
The previous reviews are absolutely true. Their sales rep, Kenny Thompson, who has over 20 years of experience in this business, spoke like a genuine person on the phone. He won my business and promised the credit card machine will go out today. That was Friday, 2/4/22. Monday came and went. I followed up on Tuesday and one rep was clueless; The other promised to give me the tracking number in couple of hours. You guessed it! No call, no email, no tracking number. I called again today (Wed, 2/16/22) and was told that the credit card machine has not even been shipped out! Do you think Kenny ever responded to my vms and emails? Yup, so much for a genuine salesperson. I cancelled the order and will go with someone that is truly genuine. Seems like management does not give a hoot r else they would be listening to the phone calls from irate customers, who are losing money everyday.
Good luck, Fraudsters!

originalText.text: Anthony Herrera was my salesman and he mislead me to the fullest.  He told me that the rates would be below 2% and when the contract came over there were hidden fees and rates as high as 5%.  We declined signing the contract and decided to not move  forward.  Then Sindy Vargas contacted me to sign a cancellation form.  I  declined to fill out the form, since we never moved forward with the account.  She then charged me a $350 cancellation charge and lied and said that I had signed a contract for 3 years.  I had to dispute the charges with my bank.  She was so rude and ignorant I can barely find the words to describe.  What a terrible company and terrible group of employees.  Lied and tried to force me into the contract even though we did not sign the agreement. They even emailed my wife over and over again the contracts, hoping she would sign after we declined.  Stay AWAY.  They deserve negative stars.

originalText.text: Do not use this company! Sales rep told me low prices and NO cancellation fees. Total fees ended up being higher than what I was paying before, and so, I cancelled after a year. They charged me a $250.00 cancellation fee and told me I had signed a contract and they would send it within 24 hours. After 48 hours I received a contract that I had never seen before and had an alleged electronic signature with my name spelled wrong! And forget about customer service! I spent hours on the phone on hold with no one answering. And if a message tells you they will call back forget it. They never did!
